channel.title: Digital-humanities on Michael Healy
channel.description: Recent content in Digital-humanities on Michael Healy

item.title: Open Site Initiative
item.description: After a presentation and conversation with Alex Gil, I’ve chosen, as a summer project, to re-do my personal website, for a few reasons: To better know the technologies I use. To better, and more openly, represent my work. To have more control over my making. I would like to know where the things I’m doing are going. To get off of a self-hosted Wordpress site. These is a big project for the summer, but luckily, I think it is working out.
